resources.string: 1) Click \"GO VIRTUAL\" and insert your Smart-phone into VR headset.
2) If you wear Specs, Please remove it and wear the VR headset.
3) Remember the colors under which the text is not clearly visible to you and Click \"NEXT\".
Select the Colors under which the\nText is not clearly visible to you
Click here if you want to visit VR again >
1) What color did you see above letter \'E\' ?
2) What color did you see above letters \'TEPOZ\' ?
3) What color did you see above letters \'DFOTP\' ?
Its is recommended to connect your headphones for better Experience !

VeyeR is an eye checkup app in which makes a preliminary eye check-up and Color Blindness that can be done by any Individual at any instance without the help of an Optometrist through Virtual Reality.
NOTE: Tests aren\'t intended to replace complete Ophthalmological checkups and the results should not be interpreted as prescription or basis for any eye treatment.
